text: Marcela Vieyra Alamilla (26 December 1963 – 2 March 2019) was a Mexican politician from the Institutional Revolutionary Party. From 2011 to 2012, she served as Deputy of the LXI Legislature of the Mexican Congress representing Hidalgo. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Politicians from Hidalgo (state) Category:Women members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:Institutional Revolutionary Party politicians Category:21st- century Mexican politicians Category:21st-century Mexican women politicians
title: Marcela Vieyra Alamilla
